name: Ninshu Online
description:
Ninshu Online is a Free-to-Play Anime MMO-RPG, built with Unreal Engine 5.

You enter the world as a fresh genin, ready to shape your ninja legacy. You will be able to climb the ninja ranks, fight in chunin exams, become a rogue ninja, fight players from other nations, conquer enemy territories, start your own clan, and even become the village kage.

The game features a vast open world, fast-paced hybrid combat style, many PvP and PvE modes, playable villages and nations, politics, territories, clans, missions, bosses and many more cool features! You can play the early version of the game right now! The download link is posted on our discord server.

Ninshu Online is currently in active development. We are releasing new updates on a weekly/bi-weekly basis. You can download the game and play the stable release right now! If you want to support us, you can do so by supporting us on Patreon or Itch.io donations.
